def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContrato from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
podeInserir = AuthorizationHelper.PodeInserirEntidade(widget.View.EntityDefinition.Name)
breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles()
tipoContrato = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS")) podeAlterarContrato = False
contrato = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_CONTRATOS")) if(contrato.Handle != None): podeAlterarContrato = CNContrato.PodeAlterarFilialFormulario(contrato.Handle)
widget.View.Commands["CMD_NOVO"].Visible = podeAlterarContrato and podeInserir widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not tipoContrato.IsNull() and podeInserir widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterarContrato or not tipoContrato.IsNull() widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterarContrato or not tipoContrato.IsNull()
